      • getRecordReader

        public RecordReader<Text,​BytesWritable> getRecordReader​(InputSplit split,
                                                              Job job,
                                                              Mapper.Context context)
                                                       throws IOException
        Get the RecordReader for reading the arc file.
        Parameters:
        split - The InputSplit of the arc file to process.
        job - The job configuration.
        context - The task context.
        Returns:
        A configured ArcRecordReader
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a fatal I/O error reading the InputSplit
